Description: Welcome home to your 3-bed, 3-bath, +office, low-maintenance, patio-style townhome! Included in this amazing property are a NEW Furnace & AC unit, 10-foot ceilings, engineer hardwood floors, double-sided gas fireplace, cherry cabinets, beautiful granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, trex deck, large primary bedroom, 5-piece bath, & amazing walk-in closet! An 8-foot ceiling in the basement, an updated bedroom with hardwood floors, and plenty of storage. The 2-car garage has painted flooring, workbench, & cabinetry galore! Surrounded by beautiful East Lake, close to the new Premium Outlets, IN & OUT coming soon, just one mile from the N-line light rail to downtown Denver, not to mention an HOA that covers exterior care, pool, an amazing park. This is prime living for all kinds of lifestyles and stages of life!

The Aspen House in Strawberry Park | NEW OFFERING:  Premium 5 bedroom luxury home, with additional detached private guest residence, barn, pond, water rights, on a beautiful and lush 35 acres, surrounded on 3 sides by the 700 acre Amethyst Ranch. Best location in Strawberry Park, 1 mile to Steamboat city limits. The Location | Premier Strawberry Park location, w/convenient proximity to Steamboat, wrapped by mountains on 3 sides & nestled at the base of over 1 million acres of Routt National Forest. Experience unparalleled privacy in a peaceful country setting with access to historic downtown; so close you could ride your bike  to town! Hike, ski, paddleboard, horseback ride, and more!  The Land, Views and Water | The 35 acres include aspen and pine trees, expansive clear pond, Butcherknife Creek, active water rights, hay meadows, and ultra-privacy.  The land is moderately flat to sloping and has a protected steeper section on the easterly boundary.  Views span across Strawberry Park, Emerald Mountain, the Steamboat Ski Area, and beyond. The Residence | With approx 10,000sf, this 5 bedroom, 5.5 bath custom mountain home built by Joe Gillespie features soaring great room ceilings, numerous fireplaces, & walls of windows overlooking beautiful gardens and surrounding mountains. Main level living includes a master bedroom suite,  large office, reading area, great room, second guest suite and a fantastically updated gourmet kitchen. Desks and patios extend living to the outdoors. The lower level includes 3 bedrooms, a generous media/game room, wine cellar, gun safe, and abundant heated storage.  Additional Improvements include a detached, secondary garage with private guest quarters and a sizable barn with adjacent corrals and fencing.  Website available after 9/27.   NOTE: PLEASE DO NOT DRIVE UP VIRTUS WAY WITHOUT PRIOR APPROVAL. This road crosses private property.

Own a piece of history on a HUGE lot across from Lake Loveland! This charming, fully renovated home once housed a historic church serving Old Town Loveland. Gleaming, sun-splashed original hardwood floors throughout. Over $70,000 of recent improvements. Fresh paint, new Milgard windows, carpet, electrical & SO much more. New, large kitchen w raised-panel cabs, new premium SS appliances, gas range & custom stone counters. Bright, open living spaces. Perfect basement for a game of pool featuring wide stairs, large rooms & daylight elevation. Many flex spaces w room for an office, home gym AND media room. Why pick one? Large basement suite w 13x11 sitting room/epic closet. Bring your toys! Nearly a third of an acre w room for an RV, boat, trailers & more. Large 30x26 drive-through garage w electric & gas for heater. Mature landscaping. Stroll to the lake on a summer evening or take in a show downtown. Amazing location close to golf, watersports, trails, shopping, dining & entertainment.

Come see this quaint country home! Views of the valley and mountains, quiet and serene. This is the perfect hobby farm complete with 35 fruit trees, including peach, pear, apple, walnut trees, goji berries, raspberries, elder berries, and grapes! Green house, handlines, and grain silo included!  Home has newer main floor windows, roof and rain gutters. Updated kitchen with granite counter tops and new premium LVP flooring. Main floor master suite. Wood burning stove on main floor and gas fireplace downstairs. Walk out basement entrance. Basement could easily be made into a mother-in law apartment. Just built last year a 40x80 barn with power and stubbed for water and septic. Also included are the floor joist for 2nd floor in barn (40x24). Retail shop 10x20 insulated with power. All gardens are on automatic drip irrigation timers.
